channel.title: EdgeTPU on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in EdgeTPU on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Machine learning with Raspberry Pi 4 and Coral USB Accelerator
item.description: #Introduction This article summarizes the installation procedure of Raspberry Pi 4 and Coral USB Accelerator as a method of machine learning with edge device. Raspberry Pi 4 is the latest generation of the current model. The CPU and memory performance have been greatly improved, and USB 3.0 is also supported. Coral USB Accelerator is Google’s dedicated ASIC developed by Google for machine learning on edge devices. This dedicated ASIC is called Edge TPU, and you can use TensorFlow Lite’s flake work specialized for inference at the edge.

item.title: [Python] Build RaspberryPi for Python and machine learning study (RaspberryPi4 & Buster version (RaspberryPi3 is also available))
item.description: ## [Content] ** 2020/02/19 We reviewed some contents and confirmed the operation with Raspberry Pi 3 model B. ** ** Added Node-RED environment construction. ** Finally the Raspberry Pi 4 model B has started selling in Japan. In order to use it immediately, I rewrote the previously posted [Building Raspberry Pi for Python and machine learning study] to the Raspberry Pi 4th edition. In addition to the hardware, I have the latest version of Raspbian (Buster 20200213).
